parameters.name: options.root
parameters.description: The element that is used as the viewport for checking visibility.

parameters.name: options.threshold
parameters.description: Percentage of the target's visibility at which the observer's callback should execute. Default: 0.

parameters.name: options.once
parameters.description: If true, the observer disconnects after the first time the element becomes visible. Default: 'false'.

parameters.name: options.onChange
parameters.description: Callback triggered whenever an intersection change occurs.

parameters.name: externalRef
parameters.description: Optional external ref to use instead of the internally created ref.

returnValues.name: entry
returnValues.description: The latest intersection entry object containing detailed position and ratio data.

returnValues.name: isVisible
returnValues.description: Reactive state indicating if the element is currently intersecting with the root.

returnValues.name: ref
returnValues.description: The ref to be assigned to the element you wish to observe.
